subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: With labor confrontation looming this summer, the first week of the playoffs offered Game 1 upsets, down-to-the-wire finishes and breathtaking performances from old and new stars.
snippet: With labor confrontation looming this summer, the first week of the playoffs offered Game 1 upsets, down-to-the-wire finishes and breathtaking performances from old and new stars.
